description:
Six Gravity and Procellarum are two rival male idol groups who happen to live in the same dorm. Six Gravity is made up of young men who represent the months of December to May, while Procellarum’s members represent June to November. Follow the daily lives of these twelve young men as they deal with the stresses of idol-hood, school, and living together. With music by famous Vocaloid producers!

(Source: FUNimation)

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Band
tags.description: Main cast is a group of musicians.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

Kaji has won several awards, including Best Voice Actor at the 12th Tokyo Anime Awards (2013), Best Actor at the 7th Seiyu Awards (2013), and Best Voice Actor at the 36th Anime Grand Prix (2014).

Married voice actress [Ayana Taketatsu](https://anilist.co/staff/101996/) in 2019.

[Website](https://www.toshikimasuda.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ToshikiMasuda38) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/toshi.m38/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCx47ourWgyHf3iAl77MYY0g/featured)

__Non-Anime Roles:__

- Rover - Wuthering Waves (VG)
- Masayoshi Tanimura - Yakuza 4 Remastered

[Profile](http://zynchro.jp/talent/kakihara.html) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/charisma.tetsuya.days/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/tetsuya-kakihara/)

Commonly referred to as Kakkii by fans, Kakihara is a voice actor and a singer. As the latter, he is a member of Kiramune (music label) and represents the color of green. He was inspired to become a voice actor by [Yuuji Ueda](https://anilist.co/staff/95058/Yuuji-Ueda)'s performance in the Tokimeki Memorial dating sim game, and moved from Germany to Japan at age 18 to pursue his dream.

Kakihara speaks Japanese, English and German.

**Non-anime roles:**
- Wanderer - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Lloyd Bannings - The Legend of Heroes Series (VG)
-Asaba Harumasa - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)

__Agency:__ Arts Vision

**[Profile](https://www.artsvision.co.jp/talent/526/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tomoaki_Maeno) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%89%8D%E9%87%8E%E6%99%BA%E6%98%AD) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Tomoaki___Maeno)**

Married fellow voice actor [Mikako Komatsu](https://anilist.co/staff/105071/Mikako-Komatsu) on May 12, 2020.

__[Official Website](http://www.shouta-aoi.jp/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/noboru0811) | [Personal Twitter](https://twitter.com/shouta0811aoi) | [Professional Twitter](https://twitter.com/AOISHOUTAstaff) | [Youtube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/aoishoutaKING)__

Singer and voice actor since February 2011. Used to have a complex about his feminine voice, but he got over it because people liked that type of unique voice.

Ryuunosuke Matsushita in _Kimi to Boku_ was his first anime role. He also sings many insert songs in the same anime. Ai Mikaze from _UtaPri_ series is the role that made him popular. Debuted with the mini-album "Blue Bird" on June 26, 2013.

__Hobbies:__ cooking, music, singing

[Website](http://yoshimasa-hosoya.info/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/hosoya_info) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yoshimasa.hosoya/) | [Staff Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yoshimasa_hosoya_staff/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6cry8C4nNpobQdf8be7cdw) | [YT Twitter](https://twitter.com/bokudake369) | [Weibo](https://weibo.com/u/7599287210)


A Japanese voice actor, singer and narrator. He graduated from Tokyo Announce Gakuin Performing Arts College, then joined Mausu Promotion Actor Training Center in 2002, and signed on with Mausu Promotion in 2006. He is currently a freelancer.

__Awards:__
- 8th Seiyuu Awards - Best Supporting Voice Actor for his role as [Yuusuke Asahina](https://anilist.co/character/47223/)
- 10th Seiyuu Awards - Best Supporting Voice Actor for his roles as [Orga Itsuka](https://anilist.co/character/89235/) and [Ginti](https://anilist.co/character/88683/)

__Non-Anime Roles:__
- Welt in "Honkai Star Rail" (VG)
- Gaius Worzel in "The Legend of Heroes" series (VG)
- Basilio Lupus Magnus in "Metaphor: ReFantazio" (VG)
[Agency Profile](http://zynchro.jp/talent/kenn.html)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Ryouhey_Drunk) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCP-evNobN1MJ61xHb8tAhcg)

Won Best Supporting Actor at the 6th Annual Seiyuu Awards for his performance as Kodaka Hasegawa in _Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai_. Also part of the trio Trignal with fellow seiyuu [Takuya Eguchi](https://anilist.co/staff/102695/Eguchi-Takuya) and [Tsubasa Yonaga](https://anilist.co/staff/95556), and a host of the Kiramune label's radio programs.

• Touri Wataru (Hanaemu Kare to & bloom)!~

Utata P, also known as t.Komine, is a professional musician. He introduces himself as a sound designer. Utata-P is one of the leading VOCALOID trance music creators. He does not write lyrics by himself and he often works with orange, a professional lyricist.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/jonsann)

Akira Takizawa is a musician, talent, lyricist, composer, arranger and singer from Sanda, Hyogo Prefecture, Japan. He also works under the name John.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/jonsann)

Akira Takizawa is a musician, talent, lyricist, composer, arranger and singer from Sanda, Hyogo Prefecture, Japan. He also works under the name John.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/samorira9)

[Official Website (with Hitoshizuku-P)](http://hitoshizuku-yama.com) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/fackingbee) | [YouTube 2](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCaFQGU865xTR96OFSnQzBdQ) | [Nico Nico Douga](https://www.nicovideo.jp/user/10599414/mylist) | [Bili Bili](https://space.bilibili.com/363544191) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/shoma1983) | [Blog](http://yamashizuku.web.fc2.com)

Yama△ (やま△ Yamasankakkei) is a producer known for making collaborative works with Hitoshizuku-P (often written as Hitoshizuku-P x Yama / ひとしずくP × やま△ or Yamashizuku / やましずく).
